statements: SELECT * FROM real_estate_market_data;
SELECT property_address, property_value FROM real_estate_market_data;
SELECT property_id, property_address, property_value, market_trend FROM real_estate_market_data WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_market_data WHERE property_value > 100000;
SELECT property_id, property_address, property_value, market_statistics FROM real_estate_market_data ORDER BY property_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_market_data;
SELECT property_address, property_value FROM real_estate_market_data WHERE property_value > 500000;
SELECT property_id, property_address, market_trend FROM real_estate_market_data ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT property_address, market_statistics->'location' FROM real_estate_market_data WHERE market_statistics->>'avg_price' >= '100000';
SELECT AVG(property_value), market_trend FROM real_estate_market_data GROUP BY market_trend HAVING COUNT(property_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE neighborhood_id = 1;
SELECT property_name, property_value FROM market_data ORDER BY property_value DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_properties FROM market_data;
SELECT MAX(property_value) as max_property_value FROM market_data;
SELECT property_name, entry_date FROM market_data WHERE entry_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE neighborhood_id = 1 ORDER BY property_value DESC
SELECT property_name, property_value FROM market_data WHERE property_value > 50000 AND entry_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT property_name, property_value, entry_date FROM market_data WHERE neighborhood_id = 2 AND entry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY entry_date ASC
SELECT neighborhood_id, COUNT(DISTINCT property_id) AS property_count FROM market_data GROUP BY neighborhood_id HAVING property_count > 10
SELECT AVG(average_price) AS avg_price, MAX(total_sales) AS max_sales FROM market_statistics WHERE year = 2022
SELECT * FROM property_values LIMIT 5;
SELECT address, value FROM property_values WHERE value > 100000;
SELECT property_id, address, date FROM property_values ORDER By date ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Sales' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_id, description FROM market_trends ORDER BY trend_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM property_values WHERE value > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT address, value FROM property_values WHERE address LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM property_values WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.property_id, p.address, m.description FROM property_values p JOIN market_trends m ON p.property_id = m.trend_id WHERE m.trend_type = 'Upward' ORDER BY p.property_id;
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value FROM property_values WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE year_built > 2000;
SELECT address, square_footage FROM properties WHERE last_sale_price > 500000;
SELECT property_id, address, year_built FROM properties ORDER BY year_built DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, median_income FROM neighborhoods WHERE school_rating >= 8;
SELECT trend_date, sale_price, trend_type FROM trends WHERE property_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT address, square_footage FROM properties WHERE year_built > 2000;
SELECT property_id, address, last_sale_price FROM properties WHERE square_footage >= 2000 ORDER BY last_sale_price DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_id, neighborhood_name, median_income, crime_rate FROM neighborhoods WHERE crime_rate < 5 ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, median_income, school_rating FROM neighborhoods WHERE school_rating > 8 ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_values;
SELECT property_id, value, date FROM property_values ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT region_name, region_description FROM market_regions WHERE region_population > 100000;
SELECT stat_name, stat_value FROM market_statistics WHERE stat_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM market_regions WHERE region_population > 100000 ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT property_id, property_address FROM property_details WHERE property_price > 500000 ORDER BY property_price DESC;
SELECT trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT property_id, property_type, property_size_sqft, property_price FROM property_details WHERE property_size_sqft < 2000 ORDER BY property_type ASC;
SELECT stat_name, stat_value FROM market_statistics WHERE stat_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
